modName: Left Hand Rings Visible in 1st Person
summary: Left Hand Rings visible in first person view
descriptionHtml:
A single esp that make Left Hand Rings visible in first person view.

You\'ll need the mod first : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21720/?

This mod modifies the original races, it will conflict with RACE MODS, but Elenear made a SkyRe patch. Thanks to him.

For Dual Sheath Redux users : I checked the slot 60 in my mod, you have to change DSR slot to 59 with SUM.

All credits to duggelz and Shadowjin.
author: Yemgi

files.name: LHRV ENG and SkyRe patches by  Elenear
Left Hand Rings Visibility FRENCH NO SkyRe by Yemgi
